slimsword.name: Slim Sword
slimsword.desc: A lightweight sword favored by female fighters. It's easy to wield but has low power.

ironsword.name: Iron Sword
ironsword.desc: A sword possessing high durability but little power. It is the most common sword.

trainer.name: Trainer
trainer.desc: A sword used for training. It deals no real damage, and it does not wear down with use.

veninedge.name: Venin Edge
veninedge.desc: A sword whose blade conceals a poison reservoir. Units hit with this will be poisoned.

steelsword.name: Steel Sword
steelsword.desc: A sturdy sword with a good edge. It is slightly difficult to wield.

ironblade.name: Iron Blade
ironblade.desc: A sword with a large, heavy blade. The weight of the blade gives it good power.

armorslayer.name: Armorslayer
armorslayer.desc: A sword for use against armored foes. It is especially effective against generals and knights.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.desc: A sword designed to deal increased damage against units mounted on horseback.

killingedge.name: Killing Edge
killingedge.desc: A sword with an unusually high chance of landing a critical hit.

laguzslayer.name: Laguzslayer
laguzslayer.desc: A sword designed for use against demihumans. It does increased damage against laguz.

steelblade.name: Steel Blade
steelblade.desc: A sword with a heavy steel blade. It is large and fairly powerful.

bravesword.name: Brave Sword
bravesword.desc: A very difficult sword to use, but its wielder can attack twice in a single round.

sonicsword.name: Sonic Sword
sonicsword.desc: A sorcerous blade that uses magic, not strength, to attack.

reference.Other Effects:
Counts as <:tellius_wind:1317293383676334201>Wind magic under the Trinity of Magic and not as a sword under the weapon triangle.
Effective against Flying units.

silversword.name: Silver Sword
silversword.desc: A sword with an incredibly sharp edge. It is difficult to wield and expensive to purchase.

silverblade.name: Silver Blade
silverblade.desc: A high-priced sword of high power. It's large, heavy, and difficult to wield.

runesword.name: Runesword
runesword.desc: A magic sword that restores HP to the wielder in the amount of half of the damage it inflicts.

reference.Other Effects:
Counts as <:tellius_light:1317303113777938473>Light magic under the Trinity of Magic and not as a sword under the weapon triangle.
Cannot trigger offensives skills at 2 range.

vaguekatti.name: Vague Katti
vaguekatti.desc:
Grants +3 Defense.
A unique sword forged by a master craftsman. It's powerful but difficult to wield.

amiti.name: Amiti
amiti.desc:
Grants +3 Defense, +3 Resistance.
Elincia's royal Crimean sword. Allows her to strike twice per turn.

alondite.name: Alondite
alondite.desc:
Grants Defense +5.
A unique sword imbued with great hidden strength. Only the Black Knight can wield it.

reference.Other Effects: Reduces foe's critical rate to 0% against user, or 50% if foe has Wrath active.

gurgurant.name: Gurgurant
gurgurant.desc: A mighty sword that only Ashnard, king of Daein, can wield.

reference.Other Effects: Reduces foe's critical rate to 0% against user, or 50% if foe has Wrath active.

regalsword.name: Regal Sword
regalsword.desc: The sword Ike received from his father. It's light and easy to wield. Only Ike can wield it.

reference.Other Effects: Effective against Armored and Knight units.

ragnell.name: Ragnell
ragnell.desc:
Grants +5 Defense.
A sword consecrated to oppose Alondite. Only Ike can wield it.

reference.Other Effects:
Negates non-Wrath critical hits.
Negates the blessing on the Black Knight and Ashnard.

ironlance.name: Iron Lance
ironlance.desc: A lance possessing high durability but little power. It is the most common lance.

slimlance.name: Slim Lance
slimlance.desc: A lightweight lance favored by female fighters. It's easy to wield but has low power.

javelin.name: Javelin
javelin.desc: A lance that can be thrown at distant enemies. It's a little difficult to wield.

veninlance.name: Venin Lance
veninlance.desc: A lance whose blade conceals a poison reservoir. Units hit with this will be poisoned.

steellance.name: Steel Lance
steellance.desc: A sturdy lance with a strong head. It is slightly difficult to wield.

knightkiller.name: Knight Killer
knightkiller.desc: A lance designed to deal increased damage against units mounted on horseback.

heavyspear.name: Heavy Spear
heavyspear.desc: A lance for use against armored foes. It is especially effective against generals and knights.

shortspear.name: Short Spear
shortspear.desc: A lance of especially light construction. It can also be thrown at distant enemies.

killerlance.name: Killer Lance
killerlance.desc: A lance with an unusually high chance of landing a critical hit.

laguzlance.name: Laguz Lance
laguzlance.desc: A lance designed for use against demihumans. It does increased damage against laguz.

flamelance.name: Flame Lance
flamelance.desc: A magic lance. Its attacks deal magical, rather than physical, damage.

reference.Other Effects:
Counts as <:tellius_fire:1317293355259920444>Fire magic under the Trinity of Magic and not as a lance under the weapon triangle.
Effective against Beast Laguz units.

bravelance.name: Brave Lance
bravelance.desc: A very difficult lance to use, but its wielder can attack twice in a single round.

spear.name: Spear
spear.desc: A refined spear of high power. It can be thrown at distant enemies.

silverlance.name: Silver Lance
silverlance.desc: A high-priced lance of high power. It's large, heavy, and difficult to wield.

wishblade.name: Wishblade
wishblade.desc:
Grants +3 Luck.
A unique lance forged by a master craftsman. It's powerful but difficult to wield.

ironaxe.name: Iron Axe
ironaxe.desc: An axe possessing high durability but little power. It is the most common axe.

practiceaxe.name: Practice Axe
practiceaxe.desc: An axe used for training. It deals no real damage, and it does not wear down with use.

handaxe.name: Hand Axe
handaxe.desc: An axe that can be thrown at distant enemies. It's a little difficult to wield.

steelaxe.name: Steel Axe
steelaxe.desc: A sturdy axe with a good edge. It is slightly difficult to wield.

devilaxe.name: Devil Axe
devilaxe.desc: A cursed axe. It is very powerful, but there is a chance that it will harm its wielder.

veninaxe.name: Venin Axe
veninaxe.desc: An axe whose blade conceals a poison reservoir. Units hit with this will be poisoned.

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.desc: An axe for use against armored foes. It is especially effective against generals and knights.

poleax.name: Poleax
poleax.desc: An axe designed to deal increased damage against units mounted on horseback.

shortaxe.name: Short Axe
shortaxe.desc: An axe of especially light construction. It can be thrown at distant enemies.

killeraxe.name: Killer Axe
killeraxe.desc: An axe with an unusually high chance of landing a critical hit.

laguzaxe.name: Laguz Axe
laguzaxe.desc: An axe designed for use against demihumans. It does increased damage against laguz.

boltaxe.name: Bolt Axe
boltaxe.desc: A magic axe. Its attacks deal magical, rather than physical, damage.

reference.Other Effects:
Counts as <:tellius_thunder:1317293369742856227>Thunder magic under the Trinity of Magic and not as an axe under the weapon triangle.
Effective against Dragon Laguz units.

braveaxe.name: Brave Axe
braveaxe.desc: A very difficult axe to use, but its wielder can attack twice in a single round.

tomahawk.name: Tomahawk
tomahawk.desc: A well-designed axe of great power. It can be thrown at distant enemies.

silveraxe.name: Silver Axe
silveraxe.desc: An axe with an incredibly sharp edge. It is difficult to wield and expensive to purchase.

urvan.name: Urvan
urvan.desc:
Grants +3 Resistance.
A unique axe forged by a master craftsman. It's powerful but difficult to wield.

ironbow.name: Iron Bow
ironbow.desc: A bow possessing high durability but little power. It is the most common bow.

ballista.name: Ballista
ballista.desc: A long-range weapon for use by archers and snipers.

longballista.name: Long Ballista
longballista.desc: A long-range weapon for use by archers and snipers. Its range surpasses the ballista.

killerballista.name: Killer Ballista
killerballista.desc: A long-range weapon that has a high chance of dealing a critical hit.

onager.name: Onager
onager.desc: A long-range, stone-throwing siege weapon with a wide area of effect. For archery units only.

reference.Other Effects:
Ignores user's strength. Cannot perform critical hits.
Deals 50% damage to all units adjacent to target.

veninbow.name: Venin Bow
veninbow.desc: A bow that fires poison arrows. A unit hit by it will be poisoned.

longbow.name: Longbow
longbow.desc: A yew-hewn bow of above-average size. It can hit enemies at great distances.

steelbow.name: Steel Bow
steelbow.desc: A sturdy bow whose composition makes it slightly difficult to wield.

killerbow.name: Killer Bow
killerbow.desc: A bow with an unusually high chance of landing a critical hit.

laguzbow.name: Laguz Bow
laguzbow.desc: A bow designed for use against demihumans. It does increased damage against laguz.

bravebow.name: Brave Bow
bravebow.desc: A very difficult bow to use, but its wielder can attack twice in a single round.

brightbow.name: Bright Bow
brightbow.desc: An arcane bow that uses magic, not strength, to attack.

reference.Other Effects:
Unused.
Counts as <:tellius_light:1317303113777938473>Light magic under the Trinity of Magic and not as a bow.

silverbow.name: Silver Bow
silverbow.desc: A high-priced bow of high power. It is expensive and difficult to wield.

doublebow.name: Double Bow
doublebow.desc:
Grants +3 Strength.
A unique bow made by a master craftsman. It's powerful but difficult to wield.

rolfsbow.name: Rolf's Bow
rolfsbow.desc: A special bow designed to help Rolf master archery. Only Rolf can wield it.

fire.name: Fire
fire.desc: Low-level fire magic. It is simple to master, but it possesses little destructive power.

elfire.name: Elfire
elfire.desc: Mid-level fire magic. It is somewhat difficult to master, but it deals a fair amount of damage.

meteor.name: Meteor
meteor.desc: Long-range fire magic. Although it is difficult to master, it can strike enemies from afar.

bolganone.name: Bolganone
bolganone.desc: High-level fire magic. It's very difficult to master, but it bears much destructive strength.

rexflame.name: Rexflame
rexflame.desc:
Grants +3 Speed.
The highest level of fire magic. Mastery is quite difficult, but it is devastatingly powerful.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.desc: Low-level lightning magic. It is simple to master, but it possesses little destructive power.

elthunder.name: Elthunder
elthunder.desc: Mid-level thunder magic. It is somewhat difficult to master, but it deals a fair amount of damage.

bolting.name: Bolting
bolting.desc: Long-range lightning magic. It is difficult to master, but it can strike enemies from afar.

thoron.name: Thoron
thoron.desc: High-level lightning magic. It is very difficult to master, but it bears much destructive strength.

rexbolt.name: Rexbolt
rexbolt.desc:
Grants +3 Skill.
The highest level of lightning magic. Mastery is quite difficult, but it is devastatingly powerful.

wind.name: Wind
wind.desc: Low-level wind magic. It is simple to master, but it possesses little destructive power.

vortex.name: Vortex
vortex.desc: Attacks with the same effect as Wind.

elwind.name: Elwind
elwind.desc: Mid-level wind magic. It is somewhat difficult to master, but it deals a fair amount of damage.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.desc: Long-range wind magic. Although it is difficult to master, it can strike enemies from afar.

tornado.name: Tornado
tornado.desc: High-level wind magic. It is very difficult to master, but it bears much destructive strength.

rexcalibur.name: Rexcalibur
rexcalibur.desc: The highest level of wind magic. Mastery is quite difficult, but it is devastatingly powerful.

light.name: Light
light.desc: Low-level light magic. It is simple to master, but it possesses little destructive power.

shine.name: Shine
shine.desc: Mid-level light magic. It is somewhat difficult to master, but it deals a fair amount of damage.

purge.name: Purge
purge.desc: Long-range light magic. It is difficult to master, but it can strike enemies from afar.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: High-level light magic. The spell caster receives as much HP as the spell inflicts.

rexaura.name: Rexaura
rexaura.desc:
Grants +3 Defense.
The highest level of light magic. Mastery is quite difficult, but it is devastatingly powerful.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: A staff that restores 10 HP plus the wielder's Mg (converted to HP) to a target unit.

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc: A staff that restores 20 HP plus the wielder's Mg (converted to HP) to a target unit.

torch.name: Torch
torch.desc: A staff that burns like a torch, illuminating an area for a short while.

ward.name: Ward
ward.desc: A staff that strengthens a unit's magic resistance for a short while.

restore.name: Restore
restore.desc: A staff that restores a unit to normal condition.

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc: A staff that restores 10 HP plus the wielder's Mg (converted to HP) to a far unit.

hammerne.name: Hammerne
hammerne.desc: A staff that restores an item to its maximum durability.

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc: A staff that prevents enemies from using magic, it can strike enemies from afar.

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.desc: A staff that puts enemy units to sleep for a short time, it can strike enemies from afar.

reference.Other Effects:
Unused.
Infliction rate: [30 + {[(Magic) - (Foe's Resistance)] × 5} + (Skill) - (distance from Foe × 2)]

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: A staff that teleports allied units to a space near the wielder.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: A staff that restores all HP to a target unit.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: A staff that heals all surrounding allied units. HP restored = (Magic + 10)

asherastaff.name: Ashera Staff
asherastaff.desc: A staff that restores all HP to all allied units, as well as restoring their conditions to normal.

clawcat.name: Claw (Cat)
clawcat.desc: Razor-sharp cat claws. They never wear out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

clawtiger.name: Claw (Tiger)
clawtiger.desc: Razor-sharp tiger claws. They never wear out and cannot be unequipped or dropped

clawlion.name: Claw (Lion)
clawlion.desc: Razor-sharp lion claws. They never wear out and can never be unequipped or dropped.

reference.Other Effects:
Negates non-Wrath critical hits.
Negates the blessing on the Black Knight and Ashnard.

breathwhite.name: Breath (White)
breathwhite.desc: The icy breath of a white dragon. It never runs out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

reference.Other Effects: Negates the blessing on the Black Knight and Ashnard.

breathred.name: Breath (Red)
breathred.desc: The fiery breath of a red dragon. It never runs out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

reference.Other Effects: Negates the blessing on the Black Knight and Ashnard.

beakhawk.name: Beak (Hawk)
beakhawk.desc: The fierce beak of a hawk. It never wears out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

beaktibarn.name: Beak (Tibarn)
beaktibarn.desc: The fierce beak of a hawk. It never wears out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

reference.Other Effects:
Negates non-Wrath critical hits.
Negates the blessing on the Black Knight and Ashnard.

beakraven.name: Beak (Raven)
beakraven.desc: The fierce beak of a raven. It never wears out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

beaknaesala.name: Beak (Naesala)
beaknaesala.desc: The fierce beak of a raven. It never wears out and cannot be unequipped or dropped.

reference.Other Effects:
Negates non-Wrath critical hits.
Negates the blessing on the Black Knight and Ashnard.

laguzstone2uses.name: Laguz Stone (2 uses)
laguzstone2uses.desc: An item that allows a laguz to remain in animal form.

laguzstone1use.name: Laguz Stone (1 use)
laguzstone1use.desc: An item that allows a laguz to remain in animal form.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: An item that allows units of level ten or higher to upgrade classes.

chestkey.name: Chest Key
chestkey.desc: A key that unlocks treasure chests.

silvercard.name: Silver Card
silvercard.desc: A special card that brings the bearer bargains galore at shops.

vulnerary.name: Vulnerary
vulnerary.desc: A potion that restores 10 HP when consumed.

elixir.name: Elixir
elixir.desc: A potent potion that restores all HP when consumed.

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: A phial of blessed water that reduces damage from magical attacks temporarily.

antitoxin.name: Antitoxin
antitoxin.desc: A draught that neutralizes the effects of poison when consumed..

whitegem.name: White Gem
whitegem.desc: A very valuable gemstone. It can be sold for an extremely high price..

bluegem.name: Blue Gem
bluegem.desc: A valuable gemstone. It can be sold for a high price.

redgem.name: Red Gem
redgem.desc: A moderately valuable gemstone. It can be sold for a decent price.

coin.name: Coin
coin.desc: A golden coin used for currency. It can be exchanged for exactly one gold.

seraphrobe.name: Seraph Robe
seraphrobe.desc: A magic item that increases the user's maximum HP.

energydrop.name: Energy Drop
energydrop.desc: A magic item that increases the user's strength.

spiritdust.name: Spirit Dust
spiritdust.desc: A magic item that increases the user's magic power.

secretbook.name: Secret Book
secretbook.desc: A magic item that increases the user's skill.

speedwing.name: Speedwing
speedwing.desc: A magic item that increases the user's speed.

asheraicon.name: Ashera Icon
asheraicon.desc: A magic item that increases the user's luck.

dracoshield.name: Dracoshield
dracoshield.desc: A magic item that increases the user's defense.

talisman.name: Talisman
talisman.desc: A magic item that increases the user's magic resistance.

boots.name: Boots
boots.desc: A magic item that increases the user's movement.

statuefrag.name: Statue Frag
statuefrag.desc: A magic item that increases the user's build.

armsscroll.name: Arms Scroll
armsscroll.desc: An item that increases the weapon level of the currently equipped weapon.

occultscroll.name: Occult Scroll
occultscroll.desc: Teaches promoted units a class-specific mastery skill.

cantoscroll.name: Canto Scroll
cantoscroll.desc:
Transformed Herons only. Teaches <:fe9_canto:1317288671690621058>Canto.
Note: Due to Herons not being able to transform while in the Base, this item cannot be actually used.

laguzguard.name: Laguzguard
laguzguard.desc: A magic item that, when equipped, halves the damage done by laguz attacks. For use by beorc only.

beorcguard.name: Beorcguard
beorcguard.desc: A magic item that, when equipped, halves the damage done by beorc attacks. For use by laguz only.

fullguard.name: Full Guard
fullguard.desc: An item that, when equipped, negates any bonus damage a weapon might have dealt.

knightward.name: Knight Ward
knightward.desc:
Grants +2 Defense, +2 Resistance, +30% Speed Growth.
A magic item that, when equipped, raises defenses. For use by soldiers, knights, and paladins only.

demiband.name: Demi Band
demiband.desc: A band that, when equipped, allows its wearer to maintain animal form at all times. All abilities are slightly lower while using the band.

reference.Notes: Can be used by any Laguz except Reyson.

laguzband.name: Laguz Band
laguzband.desc: A band that, when equipped, allows its wearer to maintain animal form at all times. Abilities are not affected. For laguz nobles only.

knightring.name: Knight Ring
knightring.desc:
Grants <:fe9_canto:1317289113157632040>Canto.
An item that, when equipped, allows the wearer a second movement, as with cavalry.

swordband.name: Sword Band
swordband.desc:
Grants +5% Skill Growth, +5% Luck Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of a myrmidon.

soldierband.name: Soldier Band
soldierband.desc:
Grants +5 HP Growth, +5% Defense Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of a soldier.

fighterband.name: Fighter Band
fighterband.desc:
Grants +5% HP Growth, +5% Strength Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of a warrior.

archerband.name: Archer Band
archerband.desc:
Grants +5% Skill Growth, +5% Speed Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of an archer.

knightband.name: Knight Band
knightband.desc:
Grants +5% Strength Growth, +5% Defense Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of a knight.

paladinband.name: Paladin Band
paladinband.desc:
Grants +5% HP Growth, +5% Speed Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of a paladin.

pegasusband.name: Pegasus Band
pegasusband.desc:
Grants +5% Luck Growth, +5% Resistance Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of a pegasus knight.

wyvernband.name: Wyvern Band
wyvernband.desc:
Grants +5% Strength Growth, +5% Defense Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of a wyvern rider.

mageband.name: Mage Band
mageband.desc:
Grants +10% Magic Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of a mage.

priestband.name: Priest Band
priestband.desc:
Grants +5% Luck Growth, +5% Resistance Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of a priest.

thiefband.name: Thief Band
thiefband.desc:
Grants +5% Skill Growth, +5% Speed Growth.
An armlet that, when equipped, alters the direction of a level upgrade. It contains the essence of a thief.

knife.name: Knife
knife.desc: A light and easy-to-wield combat knife.
